On exam, Mr. Lopez demonstrated significant limitations in his reading abilities. Specifically, his proficiency in sight vocabulary fluency, synthesizing both word-level and text-level reading skills, and the ability to read and decode lists of both regular and irregular words were all categorized as Below Average (lower than 98% of his peers). Mr. Lopez's reading comprehension skills, encompassing word, sentence, and passage levels, were similarly categorized as Below Average. A composite reading index, focusing on decontextualized phonic decoding and word reading skills, was evaluated as Below Average. Finally, a clinically sensitive composite score, designed to identify the risk of dyslexia among young adults, also evaluated as Below Average.
